reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful and worth the money, particularly appreciating it for Gatsby parties. The fit and quality receive mixed feedback - while some say it's true to size and well-made, others find it a bit big and note quality issues. Moreover, the feathers fall off, and customers have mixed opinions about how flattering the dress is. Additionally, some customers report fabric irritation, with one mentioning it caused a rash. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Darling little cocktail dress.
items.body: Who says a girl’s little dress must be black? This soft creamy pink color cocktail dress is sexy, fun and flirty, comfortable and perfect. The material feels like a high quality product this flattering piece looks like a million $$ on my mom of five body. The fit is true to size. A little stretch goes a long way. Great value! Read more
items.author: Rachel E Stewart

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Shiny and beautiful dress.
items.body: It’s a Beautiful dress . It’s a little heavy and not what I really wanted. Maybe good for a rolling 20’s or even new years. Read more
items.author: Susan Perez

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Received worn dress 2 times
items.body: This dress is really cute, but it does run small. I am only giving 2 stars as the dress that I received arrived already used and reeked of someone's perfume and arrived with no tags. Returning and ordering a NEW dress. I ordered a 2nd dress; it also came used and feather falling off dress. I'm assuming this dress gets return a lot. Returning and not ordering again. Read more
items.author: Brittney McKenzie

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT BUY!!!!
items.body: The feathers are too tight on the hips. I returned this dress and it has been 3 months and I am still waiting for my refund of closer to $100. At this point I don't think I will ever get it. DO NOT buy this dress unless you are positive that you will love it because you won't receive your refund. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute and perfect for my event.
items.body: The dress fit well. Was the perfect dress for my occasion. Under the arms were a little scratchy after some time wearing and dancing in it. I wore a long sleeve cover and it solved that issue. Read more
items.author: Misti Baldo

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great dress, but needs help under the arms!
items.body: The dress itself was great! I only rated it a 3/5 because the seems under the arms flip and the dress ended up irritating under my arms. Outside of that, it was great! Read more
items.author: DS

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great dress!
items.body: GREAT DRESS. High quality and super lovely. That said, your underarms will be stinging for days after all the rubbing. I am a small and I bought a small and it fit perfectly so it runs true to size. Read more
items.author: jjessjjones

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I LOVE this dress!
items.body: One of my favorite dresses. I bought for NYE. Yes, it sheds feathers, but not a significant amount. You'll still have a full dress by the end of the night lol. As for the fit, I'm curvy on the bottom and slim up top, so the dress fit my hips but was kind of large for my bust size and shoulders. I had to make the straps about as tight as possible, but it still looked big up top and didn't make my boobs look all that great. I have muscular shoulders so looking like I have no boobs didn't help with the overall aesthetic. So, I used boob tape to give me more of a bust; I still wore a strapless bra, but I put the tape underneath going left to right, to push my boobs inward. So for the curvier gals, I'd highly recommend that you go with the size that works best for your hips and butt, and just make the top work. It's such a nice dress, but a sheath dress can be hard to get the best size in when you have hips and curves. Read more
items.author: Amanie M.

short_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A-white, A-black, A-green, A-navy, A-beige, A-pink, A-red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
